testcase.name: User should be able to register by providing only required details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on index page.................................................passed When User clicks on register link...........................................passed Then registration page will display.........................................passed And User enters First Name "John"...........................................passed And User enters Last Name "Doe".............................................passed And User enters Address "Green Apartments"..................................passed And User enters City "Hyderabad"............................................passed And User enters State "Telangana"...........................................passed And User enters Zip Code "500003"...........................................passed And User enters SSN "1234"..................................................passed And User enters Username "John123"..........................................passed And User enters Password "JohnDoe@1234".....................................passed And User enters Password "JohnDoe@1234" again for confirmation..............passed Then User clicks on Register button.........................................passed
